sentences.en: All those figures make my poor head spin.
sentences.cn: 那么多数字把我搞得头昏脑胀。

sentences.en: And the newcomers provide a willing hand for jobs others may spin.
sentences.cn: 别人不愿干的工作,新来的人却都愿意干.

sentences.en: commercial spin-offs from medical research
sentences.cn: 医学研究引出的有商业价值的副产品

sentences.en: Just spin the washing and it's nearly dry.
sentences.cn: 只需要将洗好的衣物脱水，它就差不多干了。

sentences.en: Michelle will also spin a customer's wool fleece to specification at a cost of $2.25 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔也将以每盎司$2.25的价格按照顾客的要求为其纺羊毛呢。

sentences.en: Poor Jane was in rather a spin about the party.
sentences.cn: 可怜的简对这次聚会真有些不知所措。

sentences.en: Rukmeni's a great storyteller, so she'll probably spin them a yarn about some prince or god.
sentences.cn: 鲁克马尼非常善于讲故事，她有可能给他们编个什么王子或神的故事。

sentences.en: Set on a cool wash and finish with a short spin.
sentences.cn: 设定用凉水洗衣，最后短时脱水。

sentences.en: She sat by the window spinning.
sentences.cn: 她坐在窗前纺线。

sentences.en: She spun a story about a trip to Athens to meet one of the authors.
sentences.cn: 她编了一个故事，说是去雅典见了其中的一位作者。

sentences.en: The boat started to spin around in the water.
sentences.cn: 船开始在水中打旋。

sentences.en: the Earth’s spin
sentences.cn: 机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

sentences.en: The film retells the famous legend with a Marxist spin.
sentences.cn: 这部电影用马克思主义的观点重述了那个著名的传说.

sentences.en: The latest discs, used for small portable computers, spin 3600 times a minute.
sentences.cn: 用在小型便携式计算机上的最新光盘转速为每分钟3,600转。

sentences.en: The plane’s propellers were spinning.
sentences.cn: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

sentences.en: The propeller started to spin around.
sentences.cn: 螺旋桨开始飞快地旋转起来.

sentences.en: The public is sick of spin and tired of promises. It's time for politicians to act.
sentences.cn: 公众厌烦了那些有倾向性的报道和种种许诺。该是用政绩说话的时候了。

sentences.en: The silkworms have gone into the bushes to spin their cocoons.
sentences.cn: 蚕上山了.

sentences.en: they seem keen to spin out the debate through their speeches and interventions.
sentences.cn: 他们看来很想用不停的发言和插话把辩论尽可能拖下去。

sentences.en: They would spin and weave cloth, cook and attend to the domestic side of life.
sentences.cn: 她们纺纱、织布、煮饭以及料理家务。

sentences.en: We took a spin around town.
sentences.cn: 我们乘车出去绕城转了一圈.

words.tran_cn: 纺纱机；纺纱工人；旋床工人；旋式诱饵

phrases.tran_cn: 分割：从更大的实体中派生出（如公司或产品）
(北美，非正式)浪费时间（或精力）
翻滚：打滑失控，如汽车打滑而冲出路面
（母公司）将子公司转化为独立的新公司
(板球)投旋转球使击球手退场

trans.tran_cn: 高速旋转，尾旋，旋转，倾向性陈述，(乘车)兜风
trans.tran_en: an act of turning around quickly

trans.tran_cn: 使旋转，急转弯，疾驰，甩干衣服，有倾向性陈述，纺纱，吐丝
trans.tran_en: to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
